Earnings Call Insights: Bionano Genomics (BNGO) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Erik Holmlin highlighted a strategic shift toward optimizing the utilization of existing optical genome mapping (OGM) systems among core customers. The company aims to focus its efforts on its 118 routine use
